text: Does anyone know to fix syntax error with html in a module? I tried \" and \\" This is the code copied when in developer mode and copying a section code. Thank you for any help.
Did you try replacing double quotes with single quotes for attributes values?

Just to be clear, did you add those backslashes yourself trying to escape double quotes, right?
If that's the case, what I meant was removing them and only doing the replace I mentioned.
those were added by hubspto when copying section to hubl
Ok I tried a few things and it seems the error is coming from \n
I removed those and it is working now

Ok, I was misled by your `I tried \"` .
Yeah, that was actually my second thought I was about to point you at, those `\n`
looked like the mischievous ones :smile:
No problem, you did the great job Jake! :blush:
